document_data.mainbody:
Cameron "the Wise" Cymrych was High King of the Moonshae Isles in the mid&ndash4 century DR.
He was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty he was the grandson of the dynastys founder, High King Warren I, and the great-grandson of the dynastys legendary namesake, Cymrych Hugh. Cameron was the cousin of his predecessor, High King Markus, and his successor was his second son, Bran Cymrych.
Cameron assumed the throne of the High King in the , after the death of his predecessor.
He ruled for thirty-seven years before dying of natural causes in the .
